name: neuropy
tagline: A Python package for interactive analysis of sorted neuronal spike data and raw LFP waveforms
body:
![neuropy logo](http://neuropy.github.com/images/logo.png)

The latest version is available in its [GitHub repository](http://github.com/neuropy/neuropy).

For more details, see the [README](https://github.com/neuropy/neuropy/blob/master/README).
